language.entry: Though she has lost her sight, the Thorn compensates with a very sharp sense of hearing. She can easily track her enemies and prevent their attacks, efficiently protecting her allies. When she draws her blade, she recovers her unmatched duelist reflexes, adapting her guard to upcoming opponents. If she manages to read their movements, she will know how to deliver a fatal blow.

The Thorn's leather outfit, a vestige of her past, protects her while giving complete freedom of movement. Her sword cane is an indispensable asset to her, both her guide and her weapon of choice, an eternal reminder of what she has lost and what she has become.

After offering a good sparring session, the Thorn will eventually rest, yet ready to spring awake at a moment's notice. By focusing on the twisted sounds around them, she helps in training her companions to move through the shadows with ease.
Is she lost, or is this where she meant to find herself? This woman is blind, yet much more perceptive than most.
To fight the darkness, one must adopt it. The Thorn is here to help your heroes to rely not on their eyes. Do not take off your blindfold.
We would just bother each other.
It would be too hard to focus.
We need not to be too close.
Two blind people are too heavy a burden.
We would just lose our focus.
There are none so blind as those who cannot listen...
What is happening? Why can't I feel anything?
ARE YOU ALL CRIPPLED? DO SOMETHING!
Is that... THERE IS A HORDE OF THEM! RUN!
Let me try this. Where are you?
All good, I can do this... I think.
I won't move in this chaos.
I can't, I don't sense anything.
I know where I am. I'm staying.
I can't walk in this condition!
I can't hear any more threats, lets just end this!
Wh... You could have warned me!
Whoa! That was close, wasn't it?
What happened? Did you get it?
I can't protect you if you don't stay close!
You got him! Or... was it the opposite?
What are you doing? They're right here!
Nice! ...Er, what did you hit exactly?
I won't be able to do that now.
That's too risky, I'm too confused.
Too much noise! I can't focus on anything...
AH! SOMETHING'S TRYING TO HIT ME!
I can hear the crowd cheering us on!
They will hit you right here. Be careful.
Read the enemy. This is an easy parry.
Just hit where I tell you.
Here, there is a flaw in their defense.
Time to go on the offensive!
The crowd will chant your name.
Your training paid off. I'm proud of you.
You fought as a true Master.
I have something for your pain.
Nothing matters more than the sight of the mind.
Make no sound, we will sneak on them.
They don't know things such as discretion.
Time to train, you'll rest later.
If anyone comes, we'll hear them in time.
You trust too much in what you see.
You don't need to see, you need to feel.
I can smell the roses already.
I know eternal darkness. I'm ready...
It sounds like nothing on earth!!
Decay and wilt will encompass our world...

Bien qu'ayant perdu la vue, l'Épine compense avec un sens de l'ouïe aiguisé. Elle peut facilement repérer ses ennemis et empêcher leurs attaques, protégeant efficacement ses alliés. Quand elle tire sa lame, elle retrouve ses réflexes de duelliste, adaptant sa garde en fonction de ses adversaires. Si elle parvient à lire leurs mouvements, elle saura porter le coup fatal.

La tenue en cuir de l'Épine, vestige de son passé, la protège tout en lui laissant une grande liberté de mouvement. Outil indispensable, sa canne-épée est à la fois guide et tueuse, un rappel éternel de ce qu'elle a perdu et de ce qu'elle est devenue.

Après avoir partagé une bonne séance d'entraînement, l'Epine finira par se reposer, mais sans dormir sur ses deux oreilles. En se concentrant sur les sons qui les entourent, elle aidera ses compagnons à voir au travers de l'obscurité.
S'est-elle perdue ou est-elle arrivée à destination? Aveugle, elle est pourtant bien plus alerte qu'il n'y paraît.
Pour lutter contre les ténèbres, mieux vaut y être habitué. L'Épine est là pour aider les héros à aiguiser leurs sens. N'enlevez pas votre bandeau.
Garde de Rapière de la Championne
Il serait trop difficile de se concentrer.
Nous ne pouvons pas travailler ensemble.
Nous avons besoin de rester à distance.
Deux aveugles sont un fardeau trop lourd.
Nous ne ferions que perdre notre concentration.
Je n'arrive pas à les sentir !
J... Je ne l'ai pas vu venir...
Personne n'est aussi aveugle que celui qui ne sait écouter.
Qu'est-ce qui se passe ? Je ne ressens plus rien ?
ÊTES-VOUS TOUS HANDICAPÉS ? FAITES QUELQUE CHOSE !
Ne ressentez vous pas le vide ?
Q'est-ce que... C'EST UNE HORDE ! COUREZ !
Tout va bien, je m'en charge... je crois.
Vous ne vous faufilerez pas derrière moi !
VENEZ À MOI, JE SUIS PRÊTE.
S'il vous plait, je suis perdue ...
Je ne bougerais pas dans ce chaos.
Je ne peux pas. Je ne ressens plus rien...
Je sais où je me trouve. Je reste.
Je ne peux pas marcher dans cette condition !
Je n'entends plus de menace, finissons-en !
AH !! Impossible, ils sont trop rapides !
Qu... VOUS AURIEZ PU ME PRÉVENIR !
Je ne peux pas te protéger si tu ne restes pas près de moi !
Tu l'as eu ! Ou bien... était-ce le contraire ?
Même moi je ne saurais manquer ça !
Que faites vous ? Ils sont juste là !
Je ne serai pas capable de faire ça maintenant.
C'est trop risqué, je suis trop confuse.
Trop de bruit ! Je ne peux pas me concentrer...
AH ! QUELQUE CHOSE ESSAIE DE ME FRAPPER !
Je n'ai pas besoin de ta pitié...
Je peux entendre la foule scander !
La victoire est à portée de main !
Ils vont vous frapper par ce côté, attention.
Lis l'ennemi, c'est une parade facile.
Frappez là où je vous dis.
Ici, il y a une faille dans leur défense.
Il est temps de passer à l'offensive !
Ton entrainement a porté ses fruits. Je suis fier de toi.
Tu t'es battu comme un maître.
J'ai quelque chose contre ta douleur.
Tu as été formé pour cela.
Rien ne compte plus que la vue de l'esprit.
Ne faites pas de bruit, nous allons les surprendre.
Ils ne connaissent rien à la discrétion.
Il est temps de vous entraîner, tu te reposera plus tard.
En haut, gauche, parade... et RIPOSTE !
Si quelqu'un vient, nous l'entendrons à temps.
Vous faites trop confiance en ce que vous voyez.
Pas besoin de voir, vous devez ressentir.
Trouvez un adversaire digne de moi !
Je sens déjà l'odeur des roses.
Plus facile que dans mes entraînements.
Je connais les ténèbres éternelles. Je suis prête...
Cela ne ressemble à rien de connu !!
La pourriture et la flétrissure submergeront notre monde...

Though she has lost her sight, the Thorn compensates with a very sharp sense of hearing. She can easily track her enemies and prevent their attacks, efficiently protecting her allies. When she draws her blade, she recovers her unmatched duelist reflexes, adapting her guard to upcoming opponents. If she manages to read their movements, she will know how to deliver a fatal blow.

The Thorn's leather outfit, a vestige of her past, protects her while giving complete freedom of movement. Her sword cane is an indispensable asset to her, both her guide and her weapon of choice, an eternal reminder of what she has lost and what she has become.

After offering a good sparring session, the Thorn will eventually rest, yet ready to spring awake at a moment's notice. By focusing on the twisted sounds around them, she helps in training her companions to move through the shadows with ease.
Is she lost, or is this where she meant to find herself? This woman is blind, yet much more perceptive than most.
To fight the darkness, one must adopt it. The Thorn is here to help your heroes to rely not on their eyes. Do not take off your blindfold.
We would just bother each other.
It would be too hard to focus.
We need not to be too close.
Two blind people are too heavy a burden.
We would just lose our focus.
There are none so blind as those who cannot listen...
What is happening? Why can't I feel anything?
ARE YOU ALL CRIPPLED? DO SOMETHING!
Is that... THERE IS A HORDE OF THEM! RUN!
Let me try this. Where are you?
All good, I can do this... I think.
I won't move in this chaos.
I can't, I don't sense anything.
I know where I am. I'm staying.
I can't walk in this condition!
I can't hear any more threats, lets just end this!
Wh... You could have warned me!
Whoa! That was close, wasn't it?
What happened? Did you get it?
I can't protect you if you don't stay close!
You got him! Or... was it the opposite?
What are you doing? They're right here!
Nice! ...Er, what did you hit exactly?
I won't be able to do that now.
That's too risky, I'm too confused.
Too much noise! I can't focus on anything...
AH! SOMETHING'S TRYING TO HIT ME!
I can hear the crowd cheering us on!
They will hit you right here. Be careful.
Read the enemy. This is an easy parry.
Just hit where I tell you.
Here, there is a flaw in their defense.
Time to go on the offensive!
The crowd will chant your name.
Your training paid off. I'm proud of you.
You fought as a true Master.
I have something for your pain.
Nothing matters more than the sight of the mind.
Make no sound, we will sneak on them.
They don't know things such as discretion.
Time to train, you'll rest later.
If anyone comes, we'll hear them in time.
You trust too much in what you see.
You don't need to see, you need to feel.
I can smell the roses already.
I know eternal darkness. I'm ready...
It sounds like nothing on earth!!
Decay and wilt will encompass our world...

눈이 멀어버린 장미기사는 청력을 날카롭게 훈련했습니다. 적들의 움직임을 추적하여 아군을 훌륭하게 지켜냅니다. 검을 손에 쥔 그녀는 검투사의 본능을 이끌어 내어 적들의 공격을 방어합니다. 움직임을 파악하고 나면 치명적인 일격을 날릴 것입니다.
오래 전부터 써왔던 장미기사의 방어구는 움직임을 방해하지 않고 착용자를 완벽하게 지켜냅니다. 그녀는 속에 칼을 품은 지팡이를 무기로 사용하며, 항상 그녀가 잃은 것이 무엇인지, 얻은 것이 무엇인지 되새깁니다.
장미기사는 우수한 대련 상대입니다. 소리의 흐름을 읽어 적들에게 대처하는 법을 알려줄 것입니다. 그녀는 쉬는 와중에도 적들의 동태를 주시하고 있을 것입니다.
눈은 멀었지만 누구보다 뛰어난 통찰력을 가진 기사가 도착했습니다. 그녀는 길을 잃은 것일까요? 아니면 이곳으로 오고자 했던 것일까요?
어둠과 맞서 싸우려면 어둠에 적응해야 합니다. 장미기사가 눈 감은 채 싸우는 방법을 알려줄 것입니다.
맹인들은 다른 이들에게 짐이 될 겁니다.
귀까지 들리지 않는다면 무엇을 느낄 수 있을까요...
알 수 없는 것이 너무 많습니다...
더 이상 위협이 될 건 없습니다!
가까이 붙지 않으면 지켜드릴 수 없습니다!
잡음이 너무 많아 집중할 수가 없군요...
난 영원한 어둠 속에 살고 있지. 자, 덤벼라...
눈이 멀어버린 장미기사는 청력을 날카롭게 훈련했습니다. 적들의 움직임을 추적하여 아군을 훌륭하게 지켜냅니다. 검을 손에 쥔 그녀는 검투사의 본능을 이끌어 내어 적들의 공격을 방어합니다. 움직임을 파악하고 나면 치명적인 일격을 날릴 것입니다.

눈은 멀었지만 누구보다 뛰어난 통찰력을 가진 기사가 도착했습니다. 그녀는 길을 잃은 것일까요? 아니면 이곳으로 오고자 했던 것일까요?

난 영원한 어둠 속에 살고 있지. 자, 덤벼라...

When she draws her blade, she recovers her unmatched duelist reflexes, adapting her guard to upcoming opponents. If she manages to read their movements, she will know how to deliver a fatal blow.

The Thorn's leather outfit, a vestige of her past, protects her while giving complete freedom of movement. Her sword cane is an indispensable asset to her, both her guide and her weapon of choice, an eternal reminder of what she has lost and what she has become.

After offering a good sparring session, the Thorn will eventually rest, yet ready to spring awake at a moment's notice. By focusing on the twisted sounds around them, she helps in training her companions to move through the shadows with ease.
Is she lost, or is this where she meant to find herself? This woman is blind, yet much more perceptive than most.
To fight the darkness, one must adopt it. The Thorn is here to help your heroes to rely not on their eyes. Do not take off your blindfold.
We would just bother each other.
It would be too hard to focus.
We need not to be too close.
Two blind people are too heavy a burden.
We would just lose our focus.
There are none so blind as those who cannot listen...
What is happening? Why can't I feel anything?
ARE YOU ALL CRIPPLED? DO SOMETHING!
Is that... THERE IS A HORDE OF THEM! RUN!
Let me try this. Where are you?
All good, I can do this... I think.
I won't move in this chaos.
I can't, I don't sense anything.
I know where I am. I'm staying.
I can't walk in this condition!
I can't hear any more threats, lets just end this!
Wh... You could have warned me!
Whoa! That was close, wasn't it?
What happened? Did you get it?
I can't protect you if you don't stay close!
You got him! Or... was it the opposite?
What are you doing? They're right here!
Nice! ...Er, what did you hit exactly?
I won't be able to do that now.
That's too risky, I'm too confused.
Too much noise! I can't focus on anything...
AH! SOMETHING'S TRYING TO HIT ME!
I can hear the crowd cheering us on!
They will hit you right here. Be careful.
Read the enemy. This is an easy parry.
Just hit where I tell you.
Here, there is a flaw in their defense.
Time to go on the offensive!
The crowd will chant your name.
Your training paid off. I'm proud of you.
You fought as a true Master.
I have something for your pain.
Nothing matters more than the sight of the mind.
Make no sound, we will sneak on them.
They don't know things such as discretion.
Time to train, you'll rest later.
If anyone comes, we'll hear them in time.
You trust too much in what you see.
You don't need to see, you need to feel.
I can smell the roses already.
I know eternal darkness. I'm ready...
It sounds like nothing on earth!!
Decay and wilt will encompass our world...

Though she has lost her sight, the Thorn compensates with a very sharp sense of hearing. She can easily track her enemies and prevent their attacks, efficiently protecting her allies.
